Name: Incanto
Review Text: Little Italian Spot that really does not  promote itself with big signage and being located on the second level makes it quite easy to just walk by, but if want really nice Italian food this is a must find!

Review Text: Great service. Great food.  Dishes are a work of art visually and gastronomically.    One of the best in Amsterdam.

Name: Incanto
Review Text: Nice place, great staff and delicious food.  It is highly recommended!

Name: Incanto
Review Text: Amazing view @ the Amstel and Muntplein. Very lovely private dining room. Excellent winelist. And of course the food is like it should be, exquisite. A true must for every lover of "Italian haute cuisine".

Name: Incanto
Review Text: Food overall disappointing and therefore overpriced. Wrong main meal prepared by chef, turned out to be disappointing for 32 euro. Service mediocre. Restaurant provides nice view on adjacent canal.

Name: Incanto
Review Text: Amazing food for great pricing! Had the gnocchi with lobster and it was delicious. Not even talking about the red wine, everything was perfect!

Name: Incanto
Review Text: Very nice place for formal Italian diner. The service is incredibly professional and the staff speaks perfect English and good Dutch even though most of the staff is Italian. The food is very tasty, elegant and the portions are appropriate. ‚Ä¶

Name: Incanto
Review Text: Really great find on my most recent trip to Amsterdam. We went for a meal as a group and found the service to be excellent as was the food (no complaints from my Italian colleague!). The location is also wonderful, with great views over the canals. Be aware this restaurant is on a first floor and accessed up a steep staircase!

Name: Incanto
Review Text: It‚Äôs delicious food in a nice atmosphere.

Name: Incanto
Review Text: Great little spot with a view of the Amsterdam architecture.  Got to tell you about our server though - very insistent that we must wait for all to arrive before even ordering our appetizer. Kind of bordering on to uptight but we played ‚Ä¶

Name: Incanto
Review Text: Great Italian food, we went for the Chef's choice 4 course taster (‚Ç¨150 for two with a couple of glasses of wine each) best meal so far on our trip to Amsterdam. I have to admit we would never have found it without a recommendation from our ‚Ä¶

Name: Incanto
Review Text: Over priced and unfriendly don't even deserve 1 star. The waiter explained that they offered decent value for money and then forced me to pay exorbitant prices for sub standard food which consisted of only pasta and parmesan cheese on top ‚Ä¶

Name: Incanto
Review Text: What an amazing dinner!  My wife and I made a 10 day trip to Paris, Epernay, and Amsterdam and Incanto may have been the best meal.  We got the four course chef special with wine pairing.  The quality was amazing, service perfect, and price ‚Ä¶

Name: Incanto
Review Text: Wow. Great quality service, and some very good food. Went for a three course meal, and each course was absolutely incredible. Presentation of the dessert was on point, and tasted better than it looked. Great atmosphere, great vibe, good for small groups

Name: Incanto
Review Text: A hidden gem in the middle of a crowded tourist area. The steak was perfectly cooked with nice balance and beautiful texture. Great service and excellent wine list (and high prices). ‚Ä¶

Name: Incanto
Review Text: We went here for a business dinner, and it was a great choice! Great views across the canals, light and airey, and they have a huge group table which was perfect. ‚Ä¶

Name: Incanto
Review Text: Exceptionally good food, not overpriced considering it's in the city center. Nice view over the channel.

Name: Incanto
Review Text: Am I in Italy or Amsterdam? Excellent food, impeccable service and reasonable prices. Good choice of wine, although not as many choices by the glass, but the glasses available were very good. I had the rack of lamb, which was beautifully cooked. 10/10

Name: Incanto
Review Text: It is long time a go I didn't visit bad restaurant like Incanto. We couldn't complete our dishes. Service very bad and the prices is very high comparing your dish. 24 euro for spaciti with cheese. It is very high recommended NOT go there

Name: Incanto
Review Text: The food was exceptional!!!  Service was equally aligned.  Very romantic with calming jazz music.  Had view overlooking city or not.  You are given the choice of seating.  I highly recommend for an authentic Italian experience!!!!

Name: Incanto
Review Text: Hidden on the first floor is restaurant Incanto. Going for lunch a bit early,  there were no other guests at all. After 30 minutes the place came to life as more and more guests showed up. The risotto and fettuccini was very good and friendly service from the staff.

Name: Incanto
Review Text: Fantastic location, with super views.  Friendly and professional service, thanks to all the staff.  I recommend it to anyone who really wants to eat Italian in Amsterdam.  We will be back.

Name: Incanto
Review Text: Very mediocre, overpriced Italian food.  Expectations were already tempered (this is the Netherlands after all), but, wow did this place disappoint. The red sauce accompanying the lobster gnocchi was no better than store-bought tomato soup.  Other dishes were equally bland and uninspired.

Name: Incanto
Review Text: Good Italian in a nice location in Amsteedam downtown

Name: Incanto
Review Text:
Incanto is an amazing Italian restaurant with a nice view on Amsterdam canals.
The starters, main courses and desserts are excellent.
The staff is professional, efficient and friendly.
Excellent!

Name: Incanto
Review Text: We found this restaurant thru good ratings in google and true enough! We came back again because the maitre d/ owner is very friendly and the food is very delicious. I requested something very simple as i am a vegan, and my dish turn out amazingly delicious! Wow!!

Name: Incanto
Review Text: Exceptional service and location. Every meal was great and the chef even surprised us with something extra. Would recommend to anyone who likes authentic Italian food.

- Horrible experience.

Name: Incanto
Review Text: Absolutely phenomenal place. Right in the middle of a very touristy area a non touristy dining heaven. A place you can relax with special friends or business acquaintance. Meals artistically prepared for the descerning gourmet.

Name: Incanto
Review Text: We did not expect such a high class restaurant with very experienced and professional sevice in this location. It is reasonably priced for this good quality, service, seasonal offer and view. We will come back soon! Tip: Book a table and ask for open wines.

Name: Incanto
Review Text: The food and service were very nice - however a bit of a stale environment. The restaurant felt dead around lunch. There were many large windows with beautiful views of the flower market and canals. Not my favorite but still nice!

Name: Incanto
Review Text: An absolute gem in Amsterdam. The dedication to fine Italian dining, the amazing food, the service and the views make this a really special evening every visit.

Name: Incanto
